description: Try our easy to follow One-Pot Ham & Mushroom Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Ham,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Quick & easy lunch,Leftovers,Spinach,Mushroom
name: One-Pot Ham & Mushroom Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large heavy-based saucepan over high heat. Add onion, garlic, mushroom and bay leaves, and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in wine and ham and cook for a further 6 minutes or until vegetables soften.
Add pasta, stock and 2 cups water and bring to the boil. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring regularly, or until pasta is al dente and most of the liquid has been absorbed.
Stir through three-quarters of parmesan and spinach and stand for 5 minutes to thicken slightly. Top with remaining parmesan and chives, season with black pepper and serve.
